attributes.action: Stop the use of images of eating disorder sufferers at dangerously low weigh
attributes.additional_details: I nearly lost my own life to anorexia and am now trying to help others in similar situations. Pictures of dangerously thin people can be extremely distressing and make recovery harder.
attributes.background: Images of people who are at a dangerously low weight can cause those trying to recover into relapse. They are also unhelpful to those who are affected by eating disorders.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what specific action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. If you would like Parliament passing a law requiring all models to have a healthy range BMI, you might want to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/113039

Otherwise would could start a new petition calling for the specific action you would like.
